text:
This book belongs to _Liam Johnson_    Class _6M_

# Self portrait

![Self portrait drawing]

Favourite subject _Maths_    Favourite sport _Football_

Favourite music _Pop 'Shettyun George Enzu'_

I am good at _Maths_

Hobbies _Football, cricket, running_

I think the most important HWPS value is _respect_    because _you should always have manners and to show respect to everyone._

If I were an animal, I would be a _snow leopard_    because _it is my favourite animal and I don't want to be extinct._
